Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor™ System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System rapid chromatographic immunoassay for Influenza A and B antigen detection in nasopharyngeal washes/aspirates using an electronic reader.
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in the direct and qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens in nasopharyngeal washes/aspirates from symptomatic patients to assist in diagnosis; negative results are presumptive and recommended to be confirmed by viral culture or FDA-cleared molecular assay; not intended for influenza C antigen detection.
